channel.title: Py Humble Books
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle Books bundles!

item.title: Directors, Filmmaking, and Hollywood Movies
item.content:encoded: Explore the work of the world’s most celebrated movies and moviemakers with this library of books! This 25-book collection puts the spotlight on visionary creators like Wes Anderson, Tim Burton, Bong Joon-ho, and Quentin Tarantino; delves into popular genres and Hollywood myths; and much more. Get lost in a library curated for cinephiles everywhere, and help support charity with your purchase!

item.title: Mike Mignola's Hellboy by Dark Horse
item.content:encoded: Follow Hellboy, the beloved sardonic antihero, into the vilest infernal depths and beyond in this jam-packed bundle of comics from Dark Horse! Witness the occult madness that brought the Right Hand of Doom to our world in Hellboy Volume 1: Seeds of Destruction. Go to the very depths of Hell alongside him in Hellboy in Hell Volume 1: The Descent. Feast your eyes on his dark allure in Hellboy: 25 Years of Covers. And more! Get your hands on over 30 books of Hellboy and help support World Central Kitchen with your purchase!

item.title: Hacking 2023 by No Starch
item.description: Explore the art & science of hacking
item.content:encoded: Learn to think like a hacker with this bundle of books from No Starch Press! Inside this 18-book library, you’ll get expert insights on how to be an ethical hacker, the ins and outs of cybersecurity, how malicious actors engage in social engineering, and a lot more. Learn to defend systems, anticipate attacks, and more—and help support the Electronic Frontier Foundation with your purchase!

item.title: The Solo RPG Library by Parts Per Million
item.description: Adventure for a party of one
item.content:encoded: Looking to take an RPG ruleset for a spin, but can’t manage to convince your friends to try a new system? This bundle of solo adventure modules by the specialists at Parts Per Million is exactly what you’ve been looking for! Included in the bundle are dozens of adventures written specifically for a variety of RPGs, from well-known indies like Blades in the Dark and Dungeon Crawl Classics, to cult favorites like Stars Without Number and Lancer. And if your tastes run to the old school, you’ll also find plenty of solo adventures tailored for good old fashioned OSR-style play. Pay what you want for this bundle of endless adventure, and help support buildOn with your purchase!

item.title: The John Scalzi Collection: Old Man's War, The Interdependency, and More, by Tor
item.description: Discover the worlds of John Scalzi
item.content:encoded: Immerse yourself in the rich sci-fi worlds of multiple Hugo Award–winning author John Scalzi! Explore themes of life extension, mortality, and humanity amidst the backdrop of alien war in the groundbreaking Old Man's War series, from first novel to its thrilling conclusion in The End of All Things. Also included are the mind-bending Lock In series, the sprawling Interdependency series, and beloved standalone novels like Redshirts—and much more! Pay what you want for this library of stellar sci-fi from one of the contemporary masters, and help support the work of First Book with your purchase!

item.title: Cybersecurity 2023 by Wiley
item.description: Tips & tricks from white hat hackers
item.content:encoded: Take your OpSec into your own hands with this bundle of books on cybersecurity from Wiley. In addition to comprehensive how-tos covering a variety of topics in the security space, you’ll get thrilling real-world accounts from renowned figures in the hacking world. In How I Rob Banks: And Other Such Places, ethical hacker FC shares his adventures in testing the limits of physical bank security without breaking any laws. Threats: What Every Engineer Should Learn From Star Wars combines the excitement of the galaxy far, far away with the author’s unique perspective on security threats and secure system development. Pay what you want for these and more–a total of 18 books–and help support charity with your purchase!

item.title: How to Start Drawing with Walter Foster
item.description: Capture the world in your sketchbook
item.content:encoded: Learn to capture the world around you and let your creativity bloom with this collection of books on drawing and painting! Whether you’re a budding talent or a seasoned artist looking to dabble in a new medium, 100 Things Every Artist Should Know will inspire you fresh perspectives. Urban Sketching Handbook Sketch Now, Think Later will get you out in the world and examining your surroundings with new eyes. With Draw Every Little Thing, you’ll discover the potential for artistic growth in the mundane objects all around you. Get all these and more–over 35 books in all–and help support charity with your purchase!

item.title: The Art of Steven Universe, Adventure Time, and Many More!
item.description: A treasury of fantastic, fantastical art
item.content:encoded: Explore the awesome visual artistry of your favorite shows and films with this collection of digital books from Abrams! Get a vibrant look at the colorful cartoon universe of the Crystal Gems in Steven Universe: Art & Origins. Learn more about the land of Ooo and its inhabitants in the playful Adventure Time Encyclopaedia. Feast your eyes on the unmistakable images of Wes Anderson, the iconic fantasy art of Samwise, and more—and help support the Book Industry Charitable Foundation with your purchase!

item.title: Ruby on Rails by Pragmatic Programmer
item.content:encoded: Want to write powerful, easy-to-maintain code with the Ruby programming language? Looking to create great web apps quickly with Rails? This bundle of books from the experts at Pragmatic Programmers will get you on track! Explore topics like metaprogramming, optimization, testing, sustainable development, and much more, and help support Active Minds with your purchase!

item.title: 5th Edition Mega Bundle: Gygax + Kobold and Friends + More!
item.content:encoded: Searching for ways to spice up your 5e game? Look no further than this bundle, packed with a treasure hoard of 5e-compatible sourcebooks, adventures, and indispensable game aids from some of the finest publishers in the game! Sic some new threats on your seen-it-all players with the Tome of Beasts 3. Send them a journey they’ll never forget with Necropolis, a grand adventure based on the work of none other than Gary Gygax, the Father of RPGs! Broaden their horizons with a smorgasbord of new player options with the Tome of Heroes. Pay what you want for this vast library of over 70 books—valued at more than $1,000—and help support International Medical Corps!

item.title: Dragon Age and Mass Effect Comics by Dark Horse
item.description: Explore worlds of Mass Effect & Dragon Age comics
item.content:encoded: The masterfully realized universes of famed game maker BioWare come alive on the page in this collection of Mass Effect and Dragon Age comics from Dark Horse! Get into Commander Shepard’s offscreen adventures in Mass Effect Volume 1: Redemption, which takes place after the events of the revered Mass Effect 2. Prime yourself for high adventure with Dragon Age: The Missing, the comic story that leads into Dreadwolf, the upcoming fourth installment in the beloved RPG series. Get more than 15 exciting Mass Effect and Dragon Age volumes in this bundle, and support Child’s Play with your purchase!

item.title: Doctor Who Megabundle 2023
item.description: A TARDIS full of audio dramas, comic collections, and role-playing
item.content:encoded: The wonders of the Whoniverse are at your fingertips with this massive bundle of Doctor Who comic collections, tabletop role-playing games, and audio dramas! Take your gaming group on a trip to Gallifrey and beyond with the Doctor Who Roleplaying Game Rulebook and a TARDIS-full of adventures and supplements. Travel to the swinging 60s with two different incarnations of the Doctor in the comic collection Doctor Who: A Tale of Two Time Lords. Return to one of the most captivating settings from the TV show in the audio drama anthology Tales from New Earth. Get all this and more than 30 other Whovian treats, and help BBC Children in Need with your purchase!
